package.name: iliad_dynamic_constraints
package.description: Contains several works regarding local alterations of speeds or constraints. dynamic_constraints_node.py captures trajectories from the execution node to the controller node and changes spatial and speed constraints. QSR2constraints_node.py analyzes and plots in rviz current qtc state and publishes speed restrictions based on those. QTCplot.py forks QSR2constraints_node state calculus and plotting.
package.author: Manuel Fernandez-Carmona
